name: ZombieRun (itch) (Bonnate(PARK SEUNG GEUN))
description:
Game creation time: 12 hours

Development Engine: Unity (URP, 2022)

[Game Description]

Lost in the dark mountains, you must climb to the top of the mountain to ask for help. Follow the path and move without dying. Use your gun to kill zombies and protect yourself.

[Operation]

Move: W A S D

Run: LShift + W A S D

Screen movement: Mouse movement

Fire Gun: Left Mouse Click

Reload: R

Jump: Space

Pick Up or Interact with Items: E
